name: 林筱玫
objective:
本課程旨在通過專案整合的方式，引導學生學習生成式人工智慧在互動科技領域的應用。學生將學習使用者腳本設計的基礎知識，進行使用者經驗分析，並探討互動科技的相關技術分析。同時，學生將通過互動程式的撰寫，完成互動科技應用系統的開發和評估。

This course aims to guide students in the development of interactive technology applications using generative AI through a project-based approach. Students will learn the fundamentals of user script design, user experience analysis, and interactive technology analysis. They will also gain hands-on experience in writing interactive programs to develop and evaluate interactive technology applications.
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction to Generative AI and Interactive Technology
Week 2: User Script Design and User Experience Analysis
Week 3: Interactive Technology Analysis
Week 4: Interactive Program Development (Part 1)
Week 5: Interactive Program Development (Part 2)
Week 6: Interactive Program Development (Part 3)
Week 7: Interactive Program Development (Part 4)
Week 8: Interactive Program Development (Part 5)
Week 9: Evaluation and Improvement of Interactive Technology Applications
Week 10: User Testing Methods and Techniques
Week 11: Evaluation Metrics and Criteria for Interactive Technology Applications
Week 12: Iterative Refinement based on User Feedback
Week 13: Project Development and Presentation (Part 1)
Week 14: Project Development and Presentation (Part 2)
Week 15: Project Development and Presentation (Part 3)
Week 16: Project Development and Presentation (Part 4)
Week 17: Reflection and Discussion on Challenges and Opportunities in Generative AI-based Interactive Technology Development
Week 18: Final Summary and Report

Through this course, students will gain practical knowledge and skills in utilizing generative AI for interactive technology development. They will be equipped with the ability to design user scripts, analyze user experiences, and develop interactive applications that incorporate generative AI techniques.

通過本課程的學習，學生將獲得在生成式人工智慧互動科技開發方面的實際知識和技能。他們將具備設計使用者腳本、分析使用者經驗，並使用生成式人工智慧技術創建互動應用的能力。
